나의 성장을 도와주는 링크 관리 서비스: Organize links easily and grow fast
All the links you found, help you read them again
유어링크에서 쉽게 저장하고, 분류하고, 읽어보세요!: Easily save, categorize, and read on urLink
흩어지던 내 링크,: All the URLs I want to keep,
쉽게 저장하고 더 잘 읽을 수 없을까?: How can I save and read them easily?
유어링크는 시간 들여 찾은 정보들을 쉽게 정리하고 읽을 수 있도록 도와주: urLink is a research productivity improvement service that helps you easily organize and read the information you have spent time finding.
Create your own library through urLink and read it whenever you want.
Easily categorize the links you want to keep.
*유어링크는 크롬 방문기록을 그대로 가져오기 때문에 저희는 볼 수 없어요: * We just import your Chrome browsing history as it is, so we can't see it.
Try grouping similar information and keeping it in categories.
It's easier to find later, and more likely to be read again.
Pin important information you read frequently at the top.
You can move categories according to their priority.
링크 저장과 동시에 내가 설정한 카테고리로: As soon as the link is saved, it's classified into the category.
So, it's easy to find the link later
저장한 링크,: We will show you the saved link
as a card that is easy to see.
The more links are stacked, the harder it is to find.
Find the link quickly with the card containing the information you need.
중요한 정보는 즐겨찾기,: Links can be stored in Favorites
내 링크 공유하고 싶으면 복사하기,: Copy link if you want to share it,
메모하고 싶다면 편집하기,: Take notes and edit link cards
you will recieve a notification with the link you want.
Get Chrome Push Notification when it's time.
Archive notifications you haven't read yet.
with easy link storage, organization, and alarms.
